data.title: Welcome to the Brantley Group
data.meta_description: Home for the Brantley Group webpage at UTK
data.text:
Brantley Group News

June 5, 2024: Sam joined the group as summer REU student. Welcome!

May 21, 2024: Brantley group gets a new group picture. yooooooo!

April 17, 2024: Hima and Chase presented their posters at UT-ORI poster presentation.

Feb 29, 2024: Hima defended her CRP. Congratulations!

November 21, 2023: Benjamin Appiah joined the group. Welcome!

November 14, 2023: Congratulations to Nick, Chase, and Boris for the publication of their manuscript in ACS Macro Lett!

August 8, 2023: Congratulations to Dr. Nick Galan for starting his post-doctoral position at ORNL under the supervision of Dr. Tomonari Saito

July 19, 2023: Congratulations to Dr. Nick Galan for successfully defending his dissertation!

May 06, 2023: Congratulations to Nick, Chase, Abby and Dom for the publication of their manuscript in Journal of Polymer Science!

April 18, 2023: Congratulations to Nick, Chase, Abby and Dom for the acceptance of their manuscript in Journal of Polymer Science!

December 12, 2022: Congratulations to Nick for his recent publication in Macromolecules!

November 14, 2022: Chase Cromer and Hima Davit joined the group. Welcome!

August 15, 2022: Breana started her lecturer position at Coastal Carolina University in South Carolina! Congratulations!

July 15, 2022: Congratulations to Dr. Breana Wilson for passing her dissertation defense!

May 25, 2022: Jacob England joined the group as a summer REU student. Welcome!

May 16, 2022: Congratulations to Alan, Breana, and Nick for their recent publication in JACS!

May 4, 2022: Nick was awarded the Jerome Eastham Fellowship in Organic Chemistry. Congratulations!

February 1, 2022: Brian started a new position at Promerus in Akron, Ohio! Congratulations Brian!

December 15, 2021: Boris joined the group. Welcome Boris!

November 10, 2021: Nick presented a poster of his research at SERMACS.

September 15, 2021: Congratulations to Brian for his publication in Macromolecules!

July 29, 2021: Alan was awarded 3rd place for his talk on terpene-containing polymers.

July 26, 2021: Alan attended the NGRPC hosted by Virginia Tech.

June 1, 2021: The group participated in a summer city league softball team with other members in the department.

May 24, 2021: Mary Yenca joined the group as a summer REU student. Welcome!

May 7, 2021: Congratulations to Natalie for being awarded the ACS - Hach Land Grant Scholarship!

November 6, 2020: Congratulations to Alan for winning the Board of Visitors Research Presentation!

October 30, 2020: Congratulations to Nick for his publication in ACS Macro Letters!

October 27, 2020: Congratulations to Brian for his publication in Macromolecules!

August 25, 2020: Congratulations to Nick for his publication in Polymer Chemistry in collaboration with the Long group!

March 31, 2020: Congratulations to Alan for his publication in ACS Macro Letters!

Janurary 24, 2020: Congratulations to Brian for his publication in Polymer Chemistry in collaboration with the Vogiatzis group!

July 26, 2019: Congratulations to Breana for the group's first publication in JACS!

June 8, 2019: Breana, Brian, and Nick presented posters at the Polymers Gordon

May 29, 2019: Benton Bickerton joined the group as a summer REU student. Welcome!

December 17, 2018: Alan Fried joined the group. Welcome!

May 24, 2018: Jacob Scantland joined the group as a summer REU student. Welcome!

January 1, 2018: Dr. Brian Jacobs joined the group as a post-doctoral researcher. Welcome!

December 18, 2017: Nick, Breana, and Cris joined the group. Welcome!
